marklogic.body:
The same moral high ground as when they send their kids digging out the munitions that have failed to explode for scrap metal, so they can melt it down and build another one.
Do you remember the furore when an unknown American soldier Burnt (allegedly) a Koran, and they suggested they would use it to kill more Americans - well they had already given themselves full licence for that.
Funny how when they blow up an alternative mosque, you know one of the other faiths of Islam, and destroy 100's of Korans at one fire seering blast. Strange as they blow up a mosque and are holy, Depending which side of islam they are on.
I think it was better that Hussien in Iraq and Gaddafi in Libya had stayed, as hey they knew what to do and did not cost British lives, nor our money Cameron gave for free.
